title: Health giant Acadia plots break up of Priory Group
text:
US health giant Acadia is plotting a break up of Priory Group, best known for its £5,000-a-week celebrity rehab in West London used by model Kate Moss and actor Johnny Depp.

Priory’s American owner is considering plans to split the £1bn health and social care provider into two or more parts ahead of a planned sale. It comes amid another hospital closure that has added to the string of setbacks plaguing the company.

CapVest is among the private equity investors weighing a potential bid for Priory’s social care operations, City sources said. Interest in the business follows cuts in public service funding that have boosted profits for the private sector.
